attributes.additional_details: It is such a nice world we live in and birds play a big part in it.
attributes.background: Make killing birds Illegal! It is destorying our wonderful nature!

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are concerned about birds being killed, but we're not sure if are concerned about the shooting of birds for sport, or if you also want the slaughter of farmed birds for food to be banned.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
